title: Chat banned for pretty much nothing but look at what hes allowed to say to me gets away

what he was allowed to say and got away with it: i hope your whole family gets fucked in the ass by some elderly black %%%% that has cancer

replies.body:
Where are your chat logs? 

Also, how are you so sure they haven't been punished for their behaviour? 
Did you send a report in ?
yea he was reported by the rest of the team cause I was in a 4 man and we all seemed to have a problem with him :/ cause he just talked shit to everyone

> [{quoted}](name=The Walking Tent,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=FFlbtqUY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-07T03:15:12.195+0000)
>
> yea he was reported by the rest of the team cause I was in a 4 man and we all seemed to have a problem with him :/ cause he just talked shit to everyone

So did you get an instant feedback report? Do you know if he got reported if he really did say those things and your premade all reported him?

Also, where are your chat logs.
...and for some strange reason you think he ISN'T chatbanned at the very least now, why?
